controller

Class SeedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SeedController

  • public class SeedController
extends java.lang.Object
    SeedController is the controller class for seed related function

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SeedController()
      Creates SeedController object and initialize seedList with seed data from SeedDAO

      Deduct the quantity of the seed after player has plant or send it as gift

      Get the list of all seed

      • retrieveSeed

        public java.util.ArrayList<Seed> retrieveSeed(Player p)
        Get the seedList for the specified player
        Parameters:
        p - the player of the seedList to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Seed that belongs to the player

      • removeSeed

        public void removeSeed(java.util.ArrayList<Seed> sList,
                       Seed seed,
                       SeedController seedCtrl)
        Deduct the quantity of the seed after player has plant or send it as gift
        Parameters:
        sList - the player's seedList
        seed - the seed use to deduct quantity
        seedCtrl - seedController

                    int quantity,
                    SeedController seedCtrl)
        Add seed to player seedList
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the player
        seedName - the name of the seed to be added
        quantity - the quantity of the seed to be added
        seedCtrl - seedController
